Text: It seems like we've been saying 'thanks' quite a lot this week. However, thanks Dean, appreciated as always.

Hour-long live episode

Sally Webster from Coronation Street
Unexpected and crushing news is delivered as Sally risks her life to save a friend.

Meanwhile, horrific news is delivered to loved ones and a dying man makes a final wish.

Elsewhere, a traumatised Gary relives his Afghanistan nightmare.

Dean, 
Thanks for all the extra time you put in this week for all the extra episodes and specials. Very much appreciated.
@ 2010isover thank you for posing the spoilers, which i asked not to do.
Thx dean. off now to watch corrie 2003 on tv here in Aussie.

you blow me away.

Hmmm, there's always one eh Dean? If isover2010 has an issue with torrent sites then why is he/she here in the first place and why does the idiot not take up the 'problem' with the site rather than picking on individuals who are doing a great service to their ex-pat fans?
Please don't let it bother you Dean, and thanks again for your extra work this week. X
Thanks Dean. I truly appreciate the effort you make to share Corrie with other fans. Your efforts provide so much enjoyment to so many.
